name: Sturmgewehr
description:
Sturmgewegr is an isometric shooter.

The sole goal of the game is to shoot enemies and survive. There are a few enemy type you meet in the game. The longer you play, the more enemies you fight against and bigger is the variety of the enemies you meet. The game is split into a few levels. As soon as you beat all the enemies in a level you are sent to the next one.

Supported platforms Windows, Linux 64 and 32 bits, Android.

Kill enemies and survive.

Controls:

MovementsW, S, A, DAiming/FireMouse/LMBZoomMouse Wheel

Any feedback is highly appreciated!

Please consider donating a small amount if you like it!
